data.title: 7,875 Film advertising, Movie industry Images: PICRYL
data.meta_description: Download Images of  - Free for commercial use, no attribution required. From: Sailors beware lc, to The Wise Virgin (1924) - 3 - silent film printed advertisement. Find  images dated from 125 to 1950.
data.meta_site_name: PICRYL - Public Domain Media Search Engine
data.text:
French Dressing 1927 Lobby Card

A lobby card of the 1927 silent film directed by Allan Dwan. The film stars Clive Brook and Lois Wilson. There are quotes on the image.

Poster by Burton Rice for the film "Shoes", 1916

Theatrical poster designed by Burton Rice for Lois Weber's 1916 production Shoes starring Mary MacLaren; a caricature of MacLaren at center and Rice's design signature is printed at bottom-right of text; desig ... More
